problems.text: A company gives salary raises in an arithmetic pattern. An employee’s salary starts at 25,000 pesos in the first year, and increases by 1,200 pesos each year. What will be the salary in the 10th year?
problems.hint: This is an arithmetic sequence. Each year, the salary increases by 1,200 pesos.

problems.text: A group of friends decides to contribute money daily in an arithmetic way. On the first day they put 50 pesos, on the second 60 pesos, on the third 70 pesos, and so on. How much money do they collect after 12 days?
problems.hint: This is the sum of an arithmetic sequence. Each day, their contribution increases by 10 pesos.

problems.text: In a music hall, the first row has 18 chairs, the second row has 22, the third row has 26, and so on. How many chairs are there in the 30th row?
problems.hint: This is an arithmetic sequence. Each row has 4 more chairs than the previous row.

problems.text: A farmer plants corn in rows such that the first row has 40 plants, the second has 44, the third has 48, and so on. How many corn plants are planted in total after 20 rows?
problems.hint: This is the sum of an arithmetic sequence for plants in each row.

problems.text: A staircase is built so that the first step is 10 cm high, the second is 12 cm high, the third is 14 cm high, and so on. What is the height of the 40th step?
problems.hint: This is an arithmetic sequence. Each step is 2 cm higher than the previous step.

problems.text: A stadium has rows of seats arranged in arithmetic sequence. The first row has 25 seats, the second 30 seats, the third 35 seats, and so on. How many seats are there in total in the first 15 rows?
problems.hint: This is the sum of an arithmetic sequence for seats in rows.
